EmailTemplate.description: For Jeremy Kirkland only. Use this email if they sign up for program
EmailTemplate.name: Flex to AJ Email 2 - Jeremy Kirkland
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to the Platinum Purchasing program!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good day,
Thank you for taking the time to talk with me. I am glad we could connect.
The Platinum Purchasing program is a perfect fit for your business and we are excited you have joined.
I will be following up with you with your account number and login credentials soon. Once you have that, you will be able to begin placing your orders on our award-winning website, business.officedepot.com
If you have additional questions, please contact me. I will be happy to help.
Thank you and we look forward to working with you.
Thank you.
Jeremy Kirkland Senior Account Manager Office DEPOT | Business Solutions Division jeremy.kirkland@officedepot.com 855.337.6811 x 2897
Office Depot® is a trademark of The Office Club, Inc. OfficeMax® is a trademark of OMX, Inc. © 2017 Office Depot, Inc. To ensure delivery to your inbox, please add officedepot@e.business.officedepot.com to your safe sender list or address book. Privacy Policy
